projectLocation.state: ENUM: Must be one of: ['Arunachal Pradesh', 'Assam', 'Manipur', 'Meghalaya', 'Mizoram', 'Nagaland', 'Sikkim', 'Tripura']

projectSector: ENUM: Must be EXACTLY one of these 14 sectors ONLY: ['Agriculture and Allied', 'Roads and Bridges', 'Power and Energy', 'Water Supply and Sanitation', 'Education', 'Health', 'Tourism', 'Industries', 'Information Technology', 'Sports and Youth Affairs', 'Art and Culture', 'Social Welfare', 'Urban Development', 'Rural Development']

clearancesRequired: array of strings, e.g., 'Forest Clearance', 'Environmental Clearance', 'Wildlife Clearance'
environmentalConcerns: array of strings describing specific environmental issues
mitigationMeasures: array of strings describing planned mitigation

issues.location: string (where in the DPR this issue was found, e.g., 'Financial Section Page 12')
issues.detectedValues: string (the conflicting values or data found)
issues.impact: string (how this affects the project evaluation)

mdonerComplianceScoring.scoringBreakdown: CONDITIONAL STRUCTURE - Use one of the following based on projectSector:

schemeEligibilityAlignment.findings: string (Does it match NESIDS/NEC guidelines? Is sector eligibility confirmed? Is DPR rationale aligned with scheme objectives?)
schemeEligibilityAlignment.detailedReasoning: string (comprehensive explanation of why this score was assigned)

evidence.quote: string (direct quote from the DPR supporting this score)

technicalEngineeringQuality.findings: string (Are designs vetted? Technical assumptions valid? BoQs accurate? Engineering standards followed? Geotechnical, structural, environmental considerations included?)

environmentalStatutoryCompliance.findings: string (Required clearances identified? EIA/EMP quality? Sensitive zones flagged? Mitigation measures adequate?)

landAcquisitionSocialSafeguards.findings: string (Ownership records verified? Tribal and FRA compliance? R&R plans and consent documentation?)

financialRealismCostIntegrity.findings: string (Costing realistic? No artificial cost inflation? IRR, DSCR, NPV projections sound and explainable?)

implementationReadinessMonitoring.findings: string (Timeline realistic? DPR identifies bottlenecks? Monitoring indicators and milestone definitions present?)

riskPreparednessHazardMitigation.findings: string (Natural hazard analysis - floods, landslides, seismic? Mitigation strategies adequate? Climate resilience included?)

innovationTechnologyAdoption.findings: string (Modern materials or processes? Digital systems, automation, sustainability features? Cost-saving or efficiency-improving innovations?)

governanceTransparencyAccountability.findings: string (Clear institutional structure? Roles and responsibilities defined? Accountability and grievance mechanisms present?)

northEasternFocus.findings: string (Located in NE region? Region-specific constraints like terrain, climate, remoteness addressed? Benefits tailored to NE socio-cultural needs?)

beneficiaryAlignment.findings: string (Tribal or marginalized groups included? Beneficiary numbers realistic? Impact clearly quantifiable?)

documentationQuality.findings: string (All required sections present? Data consistent across narrative, tables, annexures? Evidence attached - maps, surveys, certificates, DPR formats?)

northEasternFocus.detailedReasoning: string (comprehensive explanation of why this score was assigned)

evidence.quote: string (direct quote from the DPR supporting this score)

beneficiaryAlignment.detailedReasoning: string (comprehensive explanation of why this score was assigned)

evidence.quote: string (direct quote from the DPR supporting this score)

environmentalCompliance.detailedReasoning: string (comprehensive explanation of why this score was assigned)

evidence.quote: string (direct quote from the DPR supporting this score)

landAcquisition.detailedReasoning: string (comprehensive explanation of why this score was assigned)

evidence.quote: string (direct quote from the DPR supporting this score)

documentationQuality.detailedReasoning: string (comprehensive explanation of why this score was assigned)

evidence.quote: string (direct quote from the DPR supporting this score)

financialViability.detailedReasoning: string (comprehensive explanation of why this score was assigned)

evidence.quote: string (direct quote from the DPR supporting this score)

complianceGaps: array of strings describing specific compliance gaps
complianceStrengths: array of strings describing what the project does well

criticalActions: array of strings - must-fix items before approval
bestPractices: array of strings - industry/MDoNER best practices to adopt
nextSteps: array of strings - specific actionable next steps in priority order
